sentence.Network_en: The essence of the denigration of women is our definition as sex object.
sentence.Network_cn: 诋毁妇女的实质就是视我们为性目标.

sentence.Network_en: None of you a failure as a denigration of your intellect.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要觉得失败而诋毁了自己的才华.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...impractical adj. 不切实际的，缺乏实践经验的denigration n. 贬损frequency n. 频繁.

list.abs: there's enough to think about and admire in the game without resorting to denigrating people .比赛有很多可以去思考和享受的，而不用非要去侮辱别人。
denigrate sb's character , achievements , etc诋毁某人的人格、成就等。
for those who deliberately provocative , deliberately denigrate the people and give him a smile , let the remaining time to prove that things better .对于那些无理取闹、蓄意诋毁的人，给他一个微笑，剩下的事就让时间去证明好了。
Complaining about perceived rivals . Blatantly trying to denigrate rivals , revealing your poverty mentality and desperation ., 意识到有情敌出现就抱怨 ; 明目张胆的试图诋毁对手 , 暴露出你的可怜又绝望的心态.

entry.def: If you denigrate someone or something, you criticize them unfairly or insult them.

example.ex: The amendment prohibits obscene or indecent materials which denigrate the objects or beliefs of a particular religion...
example.tran: 该修正案对贬损某一宗教教物或信仰的淫秽或不雅内容予以禁止。

example.ex: The Canadian Supreme Court ruled that the State can ban pornographic images which 'denigrate women'.
example.tran: 加拿大最高法院裁定国家有权查禁“侮辱女性”的色情图片。

means.word_mean: 2. an abusive attack on a person's character or good name
3. the act of expressing disapproval (especially of yourself)

auth_sentence.content: Subtle self-denigration lurks beneath the surface of Spanish politics.
auth_sentence.res_content: Subtle self-denigration lurks beneath the surface of Spanish politics.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Subtle self-denigration lurks beneath the surface of Spanish politics.

auth_sentence.content: There is no place for the denigration of opponents at any rugby stadium, especially Murrayfield.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is no place for the denigration of opponents at any rugby stadium, especially Murrayfield.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is no place for the denigration of opponents at any rugby stadium, especially Murrayfield.

auth_sentence.content: Helps to explain your offensive behaviour & your denigration of your non taxpayer funded critics.
auth_sentence.res_content: Helps to explain your offensive behaviour & your denigration of your non taxpayer funded critics.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Helps to explain your offensive behaviour & your denigration of your non taxpayer funded critics.
